channel.title: Shops! (read! please!)(rep ++!)
channel.description: okay so i was trying to add items to a shop that has items in it already. but when i try to add a new item it won't show up. for example. i wanted to add a dfs with rune defender.torso and hat. but it only shows the 3 items. and the only way i can put in new items it editing over the old ones. anyone help? it's a delta source. :confused:

item.description:
@alanpwns wrote:

okay,but what do you mean check the method?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2009, 09:44:29 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Shops! (read! please!)(rep ++!)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Your other shops may have more than 3, but the Barbarian Assault Shop uses a point system currency, correct? This means it is using a second ShopID, check the method and see if you can find anything limiting the shop.

Read full topic
